resources.string: We are a small pub located on Barrack Street, Cork. Come and enjoy the O’sho vibes
Watering hole and weekend DJ bar with comfort food in a Georgian building with sofas and snug areas.
Enjoy some of the craft beers we have on tap with good tunes, and a fun atmosphere.
We are your Number #1 Sports Bar in Cork City Serving the Best of Food and Drink in a relaxed atmosphere
Traditional Irish pub is without doubt one of Cork’s oldest and finest pubs,
